problems.title: Number of Sub-arrays of Size K and Average Greater than or Equal to Threshold (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given an array of integers arr and two integers k and threshold, return the number of sub-arrays of size k and average greater than or equal to threshold.

Input Format:
First line: three integers n, k, threshold.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the count of such sub-arrays.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
8 3 4
2 2 2 2 5 5 5 8

Sample Output
3

Explanation: Sub-arrays [2,5,5], [5,5,5] and [5,5,8] have averages 4, 5 and 6 respectively.
hintsList: Use a sliding window to maintain the sum of the current subarray of size k.
Compare sum >= k * threshold to avoid floating point division.
